CodeSystem: hts-format

HTS Format

An enumeration used to represent different high-throughput sequencing file formats.

This code system http://ga4gh.org/fhir/phenopackets/CodeSystem/hts-format defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
UNKNOWN UnknownAn HTS file of unknown type
SAM SAMSequence Alignment Map (SAM) file
BAM BAMBinary Alignment Map (BAM) file
CRAM CRAMCRAM file
VCF VCFVariant Call Format (VCF) file
BCF BCFBinary Variant Call Format (BCF) file
GVCF GVCFGenomic Variant Call Format (GVCF) file
